name: Basketball Perfect Throw
description:
Basketball Perfect Throw is very addictive and challenging game for true basketball lovers. Basketball Perfect Throw is game for those who are good in throwing basketball and expert in scoring 2 basketball points. Basketball Perfect Throw is very exciting and addictive game because of huge amount of challenging basketball tasks.
Basketball Perfect Throw is equipped with perfectly tuned basketball throw physics to give ultimate basketball throwing experience to the player.

Game Features:
Basketball Perfect Throw has great gaming graphics, controls, exciting and addictive gaming levels.
Basketball Perfect Throw has 6 gaming modes with different scoring challenges. Modes are
• Laser Room
• Dark Room
• Dance Room
• Dream World
• Pumpkin Star
• Snow

Each level has different basket scoring challenges, tackle the challenge to unlock the levels.
Each Mode has different time dependent basket scoring challenges and user need to accomplish the task in limited time to unlock the next level.

1st challenge is of 45 basket points.
2nd challenge is of 80 basket points.
3rd challenge is of 125 basket points.
4th challenge is of 170 basket points.
5th challenge is of 220 basket points.
And so on….

How to Play:
Swipe on screen, in the direction of the basket to throw the basketball and to score 2 basket points. In moving basket case just watch the movement of the basket carefully and throw the basketball to scoring maximum points.
